company.name: BidKicker
company.description: PPC Industry Experts specializing in Google Ads and Facebook Pay-Per-Click management for small businesses and startups. We provide affordable pricing, no long-term contracts, and transparent PPC management services.

hero.headline: BidKicker Google Ads & Facebook Specialists
hero.subheadline: PPC Industry Experts - Unlike big ad agencies who do radio, TV, print, direct mail, etc., we do one thing and we do it well - Google Ads & Facebook Paid Search - Pay Per Click (PPC)

about.headline: About Us
about.content: PPC Industry Experts - Unlike big ad agencies who do radio, TV, print, direct mail, etc., we do one thing and we do it well - Google Ads & Facebook Paid Search - Pay Per Click (PPC) - It's our entire ball game. We specialize in small businesses with affordable pricing, no long-term contracts, and complete transparency. All work is done within your accounts and belongs to you.

seo.title: Adwords Management
seo.description: Adwords Management, PPC Management and Facebook Marketing experts.
